subject: Ethics
title: In Re: Almacen (31 SCRA 562)
ratio: A lawyer has the right to criticize the courts, but such criticism must be made in respectful terms and through proper channels. Intemperate and abusive language constitutes a breach of professional conduct.

subject: Ethics
title: Burbe vs. Magulta (G.R. No. 139017)
ratio: A lawyer-client relationship is established the moment the lawyer agrees to be consulted, regardless of whether a formal contract is signed or a fee is paid.

subject: Ethics
title: Cantiller vs. Potenciano (180 SCRA 246)
ratio: Lawyers must not only be honest but must also appear to be honest. They must lead lives in accordance with the highest ethical standards of the profession.

subject: Ethics
title: Conflict of Interest Rule
ratio: A lawyer cannot represent conflicting interests except by written consent of all concerned given after a full disclosure of the facts.
